column1: #Text=Aiwei says : " That statue honors the first metalbender , Toph Beifong , who expanded the possibilities of what benders were capable of .
#Text=Are we going to get to meet her ?
#Text=She would visit from time to time , but years ago she left to wander the world , in search of enlightenment .
#Text=But first , her mother wants to meet you .
